title: Minecraft Warden Update is a NIGHTMARE!

comments.comment: well that is a very nice base that the warden now owns

Pewds: Bonky, he was like a father to me. I loved him like my son.

With them adding the warden they literally turned minecraft caving into a horror movie. The worst part is that the warden isn't even at its fullest ability which it will in the future updates... It would be able to climb blocks so you can't tower up and kill it and to top it all it's gonna be knock back resistant... And also a fun fact that the warden has more health than the wither boss... Meaning that the warden is the mob with the most amount of health (250 hearts to be exact)
